original_title: 少年、なにかが発芽する
overview: A boy who can't eat a tomato was pushed by his mother to overcome his least favorite. When he swallowed it, something sprouted from his own body. The boy doubted the tomato he ate and visited a tomato farm to find out what happened to him. There he met a scary farmer and ran away. The mother still tries to make her son able to eat a tomato.  This script was generated from AI, shot by alumnus of the national film school as a cutting-edge R&D project.
title: Boy Sprouted
